test_cases.description: Verify that gratuity description/remark field becomes editable when gratuity amount is zero (or verify current disabled state and document the UI behavior)
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify that edited gratuity and leave encashment amounts can be saved and resubmitted without 'something went wrong' error message
test_cases.expected_ui_behavior: Verify EOS transaction modification and submission
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify that EOS calculation completes successfully and displays descriptive error messages (not generic 'Something went wrong') when validation fails
test_cases.expected_ui_behavior: Verify EOS error handling and messaging
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify End of Services tab is hidden for offboarded employees and visible for active employees in employee profile
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify gratuity accrual report displays column headers and labels for 'Accrual up to previous payroll cycle close' and 'Total accrual amount'
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify EOS transaction form submission workflow for offboarded employees and error message display
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify that Final Settlement Amount field is visible and displays correctly on EOS calculation screen; check that UI clearly shows how deductions are applied to total
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify Gratuity Report includes customizable fields, filtering options, and displays all required information fields (extra information fields as per requirements)
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify gratuity file export has correctly aligned column headers matching data content (hire date column shows hire dates, not TL names)
Verify month labeling is clear in gratuity file download interface and employee profile to prevent confusion between months
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify Employee ID and Office columns are present in downloaded Gratuity export file
Verify gratuity liability report total calculation excludes non-numeric columns (e.g., Tenure in Years column not included in sum)
Verify Gratuity field in custom payroll report template dropdown is available and displays correctly when report is downloaded
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify payroll accrual reports (Air Ticket Allowance, Gratuity Accrual, Leave Salary Accrual) are accessible for multiple closed payroll cycles, not just the most recent
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify error message appears when submitting EOS transaction; check error message text and visibility
Verify gratuity description text displayed in EOS form; check if country-specific labels are shown correctly
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

Try: select, [role="combobox"], [role="listbox"], .dropdown

task_flows.flow_name: Process End of Service for Single Employee
steps: Add or modify deductions if needed
System calculates and displays gratuity amount
Verify calculation based on service duration and salary
task_flows.source_article: How to calculate gratuity for an individual employee

steps: Export Gratuity File with all employee gratuity liabilities
task_flows.source_article: How to calculate your total gratuity liability for all employees

duplicate_groups.theme: EOS error handling and user feedback
duplicate_groups.consolidated_test: Verify that End of Service transaction processing displays clear, descriptive error messages when validation fails, and allows users to edit and resubmit gratuity/leave encashment amounts without encountering generic error states

Verify EOS gratuity calculation displays correct amounts in UI for various scenarios (leap years, mid-month departures, unpaid leave, tenure variations). Note: Actual calculation correctness cannot be validated by Playwright; only UI display can be verified
Verify EOS feature UI elements are properly displayed: tab visibility based on employee status, report column labels are clear, and form submission workflow completes without errors

All tickets address backend gratuity formula calculations (leave accrual, leap year handling, contract type rules, labor law compliance). Cannot be tested via UI automation as they require verification of mathematical correctness and backend logic.
Both tickets report incorrect values in Gratuity Accrual reports (opening/closing balances, dynamic recalculation). Report number accuracy cannot be verified via Playwright UI testing.
Both involve incorrect document/calculation generation during EOS processing (payslip vs settlement letter, duplicate GOSI deductions). Backend logic and data tracking cannot be tested via UI.

Verify Gratuity Report UI displays all required fields with correct labels (gratuity cap field, customizable information fields, filtering options) and that field values are properly aligned and visible
Verify gratuity file export interface has clear month labeling and column headers are correctly aligned with exported data content

Verify gratuity export functionality includes correct columns (Employee ID, Office), calculates totals accurately without including non-numeric columns, and custom report templates display gratuity fields correctly
Verify payroll accrual reports are accessible for multiple closed payroll cycles with ability to filter and view historical data
Cannot test - all are backend calculation issues involving gratuity formulas, service duration, and unpaid leave handling
Cannot test - both involve backend data consistency across system modules and file generation logic

not_testable_tickets.reason: Status is 'Won't Do' - decision made not to implement, nothing to test

not_testable_tickets.summary: Couldn't change the hiring date of the employee
not_testable_tickets.reason: Status is 'Cancelled' - feature not implemented; involves backend system constraint validation

not_testable_tickets.summary: Couldn't request end of service of an employee
not_testable_tickets.reason: Status is 'Resolved' - bug already fixed, nothing to test now

not_testable_tickets.summary: can't process the end of service for an employee
not_testable_tickets.reason: Status is 'Resolved' - bug already fixed, nothing to test now
Status is 'Closed' - involves backend report generation and data consolidation across modules, not UI validation
Status is 'Closed' - involves backend leave accrual calculation logic, not UI testing
Status is 'Closed' - involves backend date arithmetic calculation verification, not UI validation
Requires verification of backend calculation logic for leap year adjustments; Playwright cannot validate mathematical formula correctness

not_testable_tickets.summary: End of service pro rated amount isssue
not_testable_tickets.reason: Already resolved; no current bug to test. Requires verification of decimal precision in backend calculations
Already resolved; feature gap for self-service reopen mechanism is not implemented. Cannot test non-existent feature
Requires verification of tenure calculation accuracy against MOHRE records; backend calculation logic validation needed
Requires verification of gratuity calculation formula correctness; backend calculation logic validation needed
Ticket is cancelled; no active issue to test
Requires verification of dynamic calculation adjustments for mid-month departures and unpaid leave; backend calculation logic validation needed
Resolved ticket - issue already fixed; backend calculation logic (gratuity formula, leave accrual prorating) cannot be tested via UI automation
Resolved ticket - backend calculation logic for payslip vs settlement letter generation; document generation accuracy is not testable via Playwright

not_testable_tickets.summary: GOSI Calculated in EOS while it is already submitted
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved ticket - backend calculation bug involving GOSI deduction logic and data tracking; cannot verify calculation correctness via UI

not_testable_tickets.summary: Gratuity Accrual report - calculation of closing/opening balance and new hire
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved ticket - backend calculation logic for accrual balances across payroll cycles; report number accuracy cannot be verified via UI
Closed ticket - backend calculation issue with dynamic recalculation on profile changes; report data accuracy is not testable via Playwright

not_testable_tickets.summary: Gratuity amount not considering leap year days
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved ticket - backend calculation logic for leap year handling; mathematical formula correctness cannot be tested via UI automation
Resolved ticket - backend calculation logic aligned with 2021 UAE Labor Law; formula correctness is not testable via Playwright
Resolved support ticket - backend calculation methodology discrepancy; mathematical formula verification is not testable via UI
Resolved support ticket - backend calculation question about leap year handling; formula logic is not testable via Playwright
Backend calculation logic for prorated leave accrual during partial month offboarding; Playwright cannot verify mathematical correctness of accrual formulas
Backend gratuity calculation logic verification; Playwright cannot validate mathematical correctness of complex gratuity formulas or partial year calculations
Backend calculation logic for limited contract employees; Playwright cannot verify mathematical correctness of department-specific gratuity calculations
Backend calculation issue (AED 0 accrual amount) and historical date selection; Playwright cannot verify calculation accuracy or backend date handling
Backend salary configuration validation; Playwright can only verify error message displays, not backend configuration requirements
Backend calculation logic differentiation between termination and resignation per UAE law; Playwright cannot verify mathematical formula correctness

not_testable_tickets.summary: Hiring date needs to be updated
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend data consistency issue - requires database verification and payroll transaction history validation

not_testable_tickets.summary: Incorrect days worked in gratuity calculation
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend calculation bug - requires verification of mathematical formula (Basic Salary / 30) and days worked count accuracy
Backend calculation logic - requires verification of inclusive date calculation methodology and comparison with external calculators

not_testable_tickets.summary: Investigate EOS pro rated mid month pay behavior for deduction
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend payroll calculation - requires verification of pro-rated salary deduction formula for mid-month departures
Backend calculation bug - requires verification of month-counting logic and leave days formula accuracy
Feature request cancelled - no current implementation to test
Backend calculation issue - system splits SIF files based on arrears logic; cannot verify file generation or splitting logic with Playwright
Data inconsistency across backend modules; requires database verification and cross-system data synchronization checks
Documentation/help article clarification request; not a testable UI bug - resolved as documentation update

not_testable_tickets.summary: Urgent : EOS Gratuity calculation Error / Bug
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend gratuity calculation logic based on departure reason; cannot verify mathematical formula correctness with Playwright
Gratuity calculation involving unpaid leave days; requires backend calculation verification, not UI testing

not_testable_tickets.summary: Wrong Total Service duration in End of Service
not_testable_tickets.reason: Service duration calculation logic; backend calculation issue that cannot be verified through UI automation

focus_area_definitions.sidebar_expanded: Capture sidebar menu with submenus visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.modal_dialog: Capture modal/dialog centered with background dimmed, show all form fields
focus_area_definitions.dropdown_expanded: Capture dropdown with ALL options visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.data_table: Capture table with headers and at least 5 data rows visible
focus_area_definitions.form_section: Capture complete form with all fields, labels, and validation states
focus_area_definitions.accordion_expanded: Capture accordion section fully expanded showing all content
focus_area_definitions.tab_content: Capture tab bar showing all tabs with active tab content below
focus_area_definitions.main_content: Capture main content area excluding sidebar, include breadcrumbs
focus_area_definitions.full_page: Full page scroll capture for comprehensive documentation
